synopsis.text:
Yuuki Yuuna, an ordinary middle school student with an extraordinary heart, finds herself in the epicenter of a cosmic battle. As a dedicated member of her school's Hero Club, Yuuna, alongside her friends, is committed to uplifting her community through acts of kindness and assistance. However, their lives take a dramatic turn when they are summoned by a peculiar phone app to combat enigmatic entities known as Vertexes, which pose a dire threat to their world.

Balancing schoolwork, club activities, and the colossal responsibility of safeguarding their world, Yuuna and her friends - the steadfast Mimori Tougou, and the Inubouzaki sisters, Fuu and Itsuki - transform into magical girls to confront these destructive forces. As they navigate through this perilous journey, they uncover startling truths about their powers and grapple with the profound essence of what it truly means to be a hero.

Will these brave middle school girls, armed with courage and camaraderie, succeed in thwarting the Vertexes and preserving their beloved world? Join Yuuna and the Hero Club in their thrilling, heartwarming, and poignant adventure that explores friendship, bravery, and the true spirit of heroism.
